paper_abstract: We propose a flexible process language (FLEX) to specify both process model and meta-process model within a uniform framework based on process ontology. A process ontology and some kernel meta-activities are presented as the fundament for process support, such as modeling, enaction and evolution. In contrast to other process languages that only can evolve process model while encoding meta-process logic within PSEEs, our approach can also evolve meta-process model for adjusting process support mechanism flexibly.
paper_title: The design of a flexible software process language
